Server.Description:
Sorcery v0.8 - Alchemy + Mastery Overhaul! http://www.SorceryMod.com
Play 7 Days to Die as a balanced post apocalyptic zombie vanquishing Sorcerer. Through training and discovery, you'll learn how to deport the undead straight back to hell by casting elemental spells of Fire, Ice and Lightning. - Unique animations, art, effects and sounds for spells and items - Pure Spellcaster playstyle - Spellcrafting: 5 unique abilities for each unique spell - Spell Arrows + Bolts - Spell Bombs - Alchemy + Potion Crafting - Armor Crafting - Rune Crafting - Spell Weapon Abilities: primary, secondary, passive, charge - New Attribute: Sorcery - New Dual Skill Tree and Perks - Fire, Ice, Lightning Mastery: learn how to craft and augment spells - Spellcast Mastery: primary, secondary, passive and charge abilities - Rune Mastery: harness the power of Runes to augment your spells - Alchemy Mastery: craft potions, elixirs and bombs - Essence Mastery: demystify and awaken the elemental essence of the world to extract and craft spells and weapons with essence. - Fire, Ice, Lightning Spells: upgrade each spell with five alterations
Latest Public Version: Sorcery v0.8 - Alchemy + Mastery Overhaul! HOME: http://www.SorceryMod.com DISCORD: http://discord.SorceryMod.com FORUM: http://forum.SorceryMod.com WIKI: http://wiki.SorceryMod.com
COMPATIBLE: DARKNESS FALLS (2.2+): Sorcery Modlet version is fully compatible with Darkness Falls. Under Darkness Falls Install: Manage Modlets > Download Sorcery > Ready to play! COMPATIBLE: RAVENHEARST (5.5+): Sorcery Modlet version is fully compatible with Ravenhearst. Under Ravenhearst Install: Manage Modlets > Download Sorcery > Ready to play!
**NOTE** This version of Sorcery is NOT EAC safe; You must play with EAC disabled. The pure XML Modlet version of Sorcery may be used with EAC enabled: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?109145-Sorcery
